item.title: Data Literacy for Product Management: Causal models and variations.
item.description: How many controllable inputs do you know about your product right now? Something like “10% increase in detail page views where the products were in stock and immediately ready for two-day shipping directly improves conversation rates by 1%” - Example from Amazon usecase. If the answer is none, this article is for you. Why become Data-Driven? Data embodies knowledge, and from this knowledge, you can construct a causal model of your product or business.
